title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.3 - Fire detecting devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.3 - Fire detecting devices

State Regulations
(a) New fire
detecting systems shall be provided with fire detecting devices designed to
operate on one or both of the following principles: (1)

Fixed temperature. (2)

Rate-of-rise. (b) Fire detecting devices are classified
into the following types: (1)

Spot devices in
which thermostats are provided at specific locations. (2)

Continuous line devices such as fire
detecting wire or pneumatic tubing, in which the thermal sensitive element is
continuous. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1501.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
